content: TOKEN NAME: ATA LiraATA Lira is a decentralized exchange running on BNB Smart Chain with lots of features that let you trade and earn tokens. We are not trying to replace the swap & exchange but to add value to the ecosystem and create a suitable and sustainable environment for people. 10% tax rate. Then, 4% marketing fee. 5% LP-generating mechanism. 1% goes to the burnATA Lira's AdvantagesThere are two advantages to ATA Lira's startup. First, the developers plan to launch a great pack of products. It will contain a marketplace for non-fungible tokens, DEX, Crypto gaming, and Launchpad. The second advantage is that BUSD commission is taken from each transaction and collected into the marketing account.What's the ATA Lira token?ATA Lira is a BEP20 (BSC) It is a cryptocurrency that generates income for its investors. It also distributes awards continuously with various events.Token: ATA LiraSymbol: ATALIRAToken total supply: 100,000,000BSC Smart contract address: 0x8604d31f3683a22b328cf6f974a34233c3494ccfWeb Site:  https://www.atalira.net/White Paper:  https://www.atalira.net/#whitepaperTwitter:  https://twitter.com/ataliraofficialFacebook:  https://facebook.com/ataliraofficialTelegram:  https://t.me/ataliraofficialReddit:  https://www.reddit.com/r/ATALIRA/Github:  https://github.com/ataliraAdditional links to trade ATA Lira tokensMarket to trade the ATA Lira tokens on DEX:https://ataswap.comhttps://vizslaswap.comFor any questions or cooperation, contact ATA Lira at https://t.me/AtaLiraOfficialThanks
